title: Just Curious...
body: Riot, when you guys disable a champion because of a bug you never state what that bug is. Would it hurt to say what the bug is especially since they are disabled and so cannot be played at all? I don't really care that much but I can't help but feel a pang of annoyance when a champion is disabled because of a bug.

replies.body:
You realize nine times out of ten you can look it up right?

EDIT: Case and point, current Yas bug.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9NI86e7LuyU

Takes like 10 seconds to find it on google for anyone who actually wants to know that badly( I know because I'm usually curious, and it's never hard to find). Doesn't seem like there's much point in them adding it in
